## Commands
npm install && npm run dev && npm test && npm run lint

## Code Style
JavaScript ES2022: Follow standard conventions with vanilla JS patterns
HTML5: Semantic markup with ARIA attributes for accessibility
CSS3: Modern CSS with custom properties, grid/flexbox layouts
